property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Input - This is the ID of the record to display or Output - The ID of a newly created record.

property.name: recordTypeId
property.label: Record Type Id
property.description: When provided, picklist values will be filtered for the selected record type.

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: If you pass in no recordId, an Object API Name, and mode of Edit, the component will open in edit mode and create a new record on save.

property.name: fields
property.label: Record Field List
property.description: A comma-separated list of field names from the recordId’s object type. If this is not provided, this component will display all fields accessible to the running user’s profile

property.name: flowNavigationOnSave
property.label: Flow - Navigation on Save?
property.description: Check if you would like the flow to navigate to the Next screen (or Finish) when clicking Save. For best results, hide the page footer in the flow screen.

property.name: flowNavigationOnCancel
property.label: Flow - Navigation on Cancel?
property.description: Check if you would like the flow to navigate to the Previous or Next screen when clicking Cancel. For best results, hide the page footer in the flow screen.

property.name: flowNavigationOnCancelDirection
property.label: Flow - Navigation Direction on Cancel (Previous or Next)
property.description: Specify Previous or Next for the flow navigation direction after the Cancel button is clicked.

property.name: isCancelButton
property.label: Cancel Button Selected
property.description: This value will be set to True is the user selected the Cancel button.
